name: Streetbusters!
description:
*Made for the ScoreSpaceJam #4  :3*

(At least try n' read this before playing, but if you're impatient, I can't stop ya, can I? Props to Locomule for one of the best soundtracks I've ever heard, by the way)

Hey,

welcome to this game's page, huh.

Just in case the game is too confusing/broken or you don't get the explanation (Which is quite likely considering I made this):

  Controls: Left/Right arrow key, A/D,... to move left and right, respectively.                                Objective: Avoid the Greenhouse gases as long as you possibly can to get your high-score up.

Hey, if anything's broken in the game, go in the comments, complain and insult me. I probably won't fix it, but 'ey, good to know what's broken.

At least try n' have fun ^^

*Play in 1920x1080 for best experience*
